aggregation: This index is the normalized average of the scores of both indices of mechanism of direct democracy which are not citizen-initiated obligatory referendums and plebiscites. For an elaboration of the weighting factor of each component, see David Altman 2016. The index is aggregated using this formula: v2xdd_toc = [v2xdd_i_pl + v2xdd_i_or]/4
name: v2xdd_toc
